About Me

Former English teacher who decided to to take a chance and change careers. I rapidly became involved in the Software World and Agile Methodologies. I gained experienced in different companies and grew as a QA tester.

I am experienced in UX/UI and site performance. I enjoy work environments where I can reach my full potential and grow alongside my teammates. I am flexible, driven to learn and able to adapt to constantly changing situations.
